author: Alex Kammerling
description: The rich flavour of the aged rum marries well with apple and lime juice.
name: Voodoo
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
75 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
